verses.verse: Thus saith <WH559> Jehovah <WH3068>, Where is the bill <WH5612> of your mother <WH517>'s divorcement <WH3748>, wherewith I have put her away <WH7971>? or which of my creditors <WH5383> is it to whom I have sold <WH4376> you <WH5771>? Behold, for your iniquities were ye sold <WH4376>, and for your transgressions <WH6588> was your mother <WH517> put away <WH7971>.

Wherefore <WH935>, when I came, was there no man <WH376>? when I called <WH7121>, was there none to answer <WH6030>? Is my hand <WH3027> shortened <WH7114> at all <WH7114>, that it cannot redeem <WH6304>? or have I no power <WH3581> to deliver <WH5337>? Behold <WH1606>, at my rebuke I dry up <WH2717> the sea <WH3220>, I make <WH7760> the rivers <WH5104> a wilderness <WH4057>: their fish <WH1710> stink <WH887>, because there is no water <WH4325>, and die <WH4191> for thirst <WH6772>.
I clothe <WH3847> the heavens <WH8064> with blackness <WH6940>, and I make <WH7760> sackcloth <WH8242> their covering <WH3682>.

The Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH136> hath given <WH5414> me the tongue <WH3956> of them that are taught <WH3928>, that I may know <WH3045> how to sustain <WH5790> with words <WH1697> him that is weary <WH3287>: he wakeneth <WH5782> morning <WH1242> by morning <WH1242>, he wakeneth <WH5782> mine ear <WH241> to hear <WH8085> as they that are taught <WH3928>.
The Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH3069> hath opened <WH6605> mine ear <WH241>, and I was not rebellious <WH4784>, neither turned away <WH5472> backward <WH268>.

I gave <WH5414> my back <WH1460> to the smiters <WH5221>, and my cheeks <WH3895> to them that plucked off <WH4803> the hair <WH5641>; I hid not my face <WH6440> from shame <WH3639> and spitting <WH7536>.

For the Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH3069> will help <WH5826> me <WH3637>; therefore have I not been confounded: therefore have I set <WH7760> my face <WH6440> like a flint <WH2496>, and I know <WH3045> that I shall not be put to shame <WH954>.
He is near <WH7138> that justifieth <WH6663> me <WH7378>; who will contend with me <WH5975>? let us stand up together <WH3162>: who is mine adversary <WH1167>? let him come near to me <WH5066>.

Behold <WH136>, the Lord Jehovah <WH3069> will help <WH5826> me <WH7561>; who is he that shall condemn me <WH1086>? behold, all they shall wax old as a garment <WH899>, the moth <WH6211> shall eat them up <WH398>.

Who is among you that feareth <WH3373> Jehovah <WH3068>, that obeyeth <WH8085> the voice <WH6963> of his servant <WH5650>? he that walketh <WH1980> in darkness <WH2825>, and hath no light <WH5051>, let him trust <WH982> in the name <WH8034> of Jehovah <WH3068>, and rely <WH8172> upon his God <WH430>.

Behold <WH6919>, all ye that kindle a fire <WH784>, that gird yourselves about <WH247> with firebrands <WH2131>; walk <WH3212> ye in the flame <WH217> of your fire <WH784>, and among the brands <WH2131> that ye have kindled <WH1197>. This shall ye have of my hand <WH3027>; ye shall lie down <WH7901> in sorrow <WH4620>.
